item.title: [HELP] Making certain command [HELP]

item.description:
@Tagged_Santa wrote:

All you want is a copy and paste, but whatever here is the codeâ€¦

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("modinfo") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@The rules of (Your Server Name)", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("How to Become Mod/Admin", 8145); sendQuest("----", 8147); sendQuest("1. Respect all other players!", 8148); sendQuest("2. Respect Owners,Admins and Mods", 8149); sendQuest("3. Do not start fights with other players", 8150); sendQuest(" just simply tell an Owner or Admin.", 8151); sendQuest("4. Help other players if they need help.", 8152); sendQuest("5. Play on Server alot.", 8153); sendQuest("6. Higher chance if you register on forums at", 8154); sendQuest("(your forums here) and stay active", 8155); sendQuest("_____________________________________________________", 8156); sendQuest("If you follow all of these rules you will be fine", 8157); sendQuest("Just follow these and you will become a mod or admin", 8158); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
